data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Marly stood staring at the petrol pump. "What the bloody hell do I put in this thing? There's no way to tell if it's petrol or diesel! I'll just try diesel in this hole at the back.". The horse's eyes grew huge and it neighed loudly.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: It was 2040 and Marly was sat at the breakfast table with her robot. "Many years ago, we could only send a letter if we had a stamp. Nobody uses stamps any more."

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: The church organ had even survived the many years of the British Empire. But, now it was earmarked for destruction and the Father had to comply.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: The dark grey skies gave a sense of gloom to Marly as she walked to the market. She made her payment and walked home with her 4 green apples. "Am I just born to exist?", she asked herself.
